author: robocopsgonemad
content: thanks for this - 1) good catch. 2) the need for hexUint is due to javascript limitations on number sizes via json. I would love to redesign to use integers everywhere but we would have to conceed that this file format isn't to be used by javascript clients, and vet to make sure that all non-js languages will parse integers > 53 bits into their native equivalents.

author: __flcl
content: Yeah, JSON standard itself does not limit integers, but afair we indeed had to take care additionally of handling stuff bigger than ulong, which was very easy fix, but still an effort
